== What is UCE? ==
Ubuntu Christian Edition is a remix of the official Ubuntu operating system. It includes application additions, custom themes and icons, desktop additions (IE: unity lens), third party applications and more.

== Why UCE? ==
Though UCE says Christian edition it uses range from home web content filter, biblical studies, uses within church networks, non-profit organizations and low-income environments to provide a secure, stable and safe computer operating system. <<BR>>

== How can i contribute? ==

Help is always needed and appreciated within the UCE team. Areas include documentation writers, testers, package maintainers, art designers and much more!
